Cloud Resume Challenge: Built a CI/CD pipeline to automate the deployment of my resume website. The site itself is hosted using AWS S3, Route53, and CloudFront, while the backend is powered by DynamoDB using AWS Lambda and API Gateway. Automation is achieved with a combination of GitHub Actions and AWS CodePipeline.
